description: The headquarters of Marine operations and the site of the Summit War, where the most powerful forces in the world clash to determine Ace's fate.

keyEvents.title: Akainu Reveals Magma Powers
keyEvents.description: Admiral Akainu reveals his Magu Magu no Mi Devil Fruit powers for the first time at Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: Major power reveal that changes the dynamics of the battle.

keyEvents.title: Volcanic Meteor Shower
keyEvents.description: Akainu's magma attack creates a meteor shower that ignites the battlefield at Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the devastating impact of admiral-level powers on the battlefield.

keyEvents.title: Little Oars Jr. Arrives
keyEvents.description: Little Oars Jr. arrives at Marineford to join the battle and save Ace.
keyEvents.significance: A powerful new ally enters the war.
